question: The National Safety Day (NSD) is observed annually on which date in India?
explanation:
The National Safety Day is observed on March 4 every year in India and the following week as National Safety Week. The National Safety campaign is organised by the National Safety Council to commemorate its foundation day.
This is the 49th year of the Safety Campaign observed in the country. The theme of this yearâ€™s campaign is: Enhance Safety & Health Performance by use of Advanced Technologies.
